    Download 1km albedo data

    Source: R/ukcp_functions.R
    download_globalbedo.Rd

    The function download_globalbedo downloads monthly GlobAlbedo tiled albedo data from Jasmin available for the years 1998-2011. Whole of the UK covered by default tiles. For further information see: http://www.globalbedo.org/index.php

    Usage

    download_globalbedo(
  dir_out,
  tiles = c("h17v03", "h17v04", "h18v03"),
  months = c("01", "02", "03", "04", "05", "06", "07", "08", "09", "10", "11", "12"),
  years = seq(1998, 2011),
  url = "http://gws-access.jasmin.ac.uk"
)

    Arguments

    dir_out

    directory to which to save data

    tiles

    vector of strings of the file name in the format 'h##v##'. Whole of the UK covered by default tiles.

    year

    numeric vector indicating the years for which data are required

    month

    string vector indicating the month for which data are required

    Value

    database detailing download details and success of all requested files

    Details

    No username or password currently required.

    On this page
